short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for getting direct summarize result for your search query

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get answers to search query instantly without the need to compare different sites.

Singulariti delivers answers to your search queries by aggregating and summarizing content from various sources, saving your time by eliminating the need to visit multiple pages to find the information you need

Simply search as you normally would on chrome browser using any search engine. Singulariti will provide a popup with the response to your query directly on the results page.
